occupation: Co-Founder and CTO (YC S19) at Taskade
headline: Co-Founder and CTO at Taskade (YC S19)
summary: Co-Founder and CTO of Taskade. I feed code to compilers or runtimes everyday, in JS, Swift or Python flavour.

experiences.title: Co-Founder and CTO (YC S19)
experiences.description:
In 2017 we started out on a mission: to reimagine team productivity and help teams reach their full potential, no matter how far apart their members may be. We wanted a better way to collaborate on team projects, and yet the right tool simply didn't exist. So we decided to build one. 

Taskade is everything we’ve ever wanted in a team productivity tool. One that would let you ideate, organize, and manage tasks together in real-time — and yet was no more difficult to use than a pen and paper.

No steep learning curves. No complex interface. No maze of functionality you might never find your way out of. Taskade makes team productivity simple, flexible, and smart.

— https://www.taskade.com

education.description: • Developed a RPG with a 3D world but 2D characters (Similar to Ragnarok Online) for Final Year Project.

accomplishment_projects.title: Polycliniczz@SG
accomplishment_projects.description: To build a mobile application that allow public to be able to view the current queue status of different polyclinics in Singapore that are run by different organizations.

accomplishment_projects.title: Showtimezz@SG for iOS
accomplishment_projects.description:
★ Won 3rd in AppVenture Challenge 2011!
★ Featured in The Straits Times — Digital Life on 23rd Feb 2011!
★ Featured as #6 of 100 Hot Apps in The Straits Times — Digital Life on 27th July 2011!
★ Featured in What's Hot in Singapore's Entertainment category
★ Featured in New and Noteworthy in Singapore's Entertainment category

Showtimezz (Singapore) is an app that will help you to decide and book your next movie showtime as effortless and easy as possible.

Covering Cathay Cineplexes, Eng Wah, Filmgarde, Golden Village and Shaw, the major theatre's/cinema's/cineplexes' operators in Singapore (SG/SGP), allowing you to easily book tickets with these operators directly.

You can easily search for for movie trailers with just a tap using Showtimezz!

Get directions to theatres using gothere.sg or Maps!

As user experience is of our foremost priority, it is designed to be simple, intuitive and user-friendly.

Try it and see for yourself.

recommendations:
Danien Chee



Stan is one of those extremely passionate, capable, yet humble people who are a joy to work with.

I first met Stan when he was working at Nexgen. I was very impressed by his abilities and his attitude and asked for him to be seconded to Cabal to help us with integrating Ogre3D with our internal game framework.  Stan is a great team player and he was always offering great suggestions for fixing problems and was very proactive in suggesting alternatives as well as new research directions.

He is always researching new technologies and techniques and trying to improve himself. His hunger for learning and appreciation for good technique and design is a boon to any team.
